verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%> <S%H7891>Sing<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7892>song,<s%> and his <S%H8416>praise<s%> in the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H2623>saints.<s%>
Let <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in him that <S%H6213>made<s%> him: let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> be <S%H1523>joyful<s%> in their <S%H4428>King.<s%>
Let them <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> in the <S%H4234>dance:<s%> let them <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises to him with the <S%H8596>tambourine<s%> and <S%H3658>harp.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> takes <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in his <S%H5971>people:<s%> he will <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H6035>meek<s%> with <S%H3444>salvation.<s%>
Let the <S%H2623>saints<s%> be <S%H5937>joyful<s%> in <S%H3519>glory:<s%> let them <S%H7442>sing<s%> <S%H7442>aloud<s%> on their <S%H4904>beds.<s%>
Let the <S%H7319>high<s%> praises of <S%H410>God<s%> be in their <S%H1627>mouth,<s%> and a <S%H6374>two-edged<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand;<s%>
To <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H5771>punishments<s%> on the <S%H3816>people;<s%>
To <S%H631>bind<s%> their <S%H4428>kings<s%> with <S%H2131>chains,<s%> and their <S%H3513>nobles<s%> with <S%H3525>fetters<s%> of <S%H1270>iron;<s%>

To <S%H6213>execute<s%> on them the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H3789>written:<s%> <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H1926>honor<s%> have <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2623>saints.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%>
